com.facebook.buck.util

Class BlockingHttpEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.util.BlockingHttpEndpoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpEndpoint, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class BlockingHttpEndpoint
extends Object
implements HttpEndpoint, Closeable
    HttpEndpoint implementation which only allows a certain number of concurrent requests to be in flight at any given point in time.

      • close

        public void close()
        Attempt to complete submitted requests on close so that as much information is recorded as possible. This aids debugging when close is called during exception processing.
        Specified by:
        close in interface Closeable
        Specified by:
